person.persName: John Newt Turner (Caldwell County, KY, merchant and judge)

body.p: Princeton, Caldwell County, Kentucky, merchant and county judge. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Jane Turner. Father of Eunice Turner and Mary Turner. Merchant in Caldwell County in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1850. County Judge in Princeton in 1860.
